<!--*Please add a concise summary of your suggestion here.*-->

### Rationale
Currently, compiler flags are passed down the dependencies. This may not always be desirable and may result in inflating package installation. More often than not, I only want to use `-g` debug flag for package `A` and I don't want the debug flag to be used for every single dependency package. 

<!--*Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe it!*-->

### Description

<!--*Describe the solution you'd like and the alternatives you have considered.*-->
I'd like to have something like:
```
packages:
   trilinos:
    flags:
      cppflags: "-g"
```

### Additional information
<!--*Add any other context about the feature request here.*-->


### General information

- [x] I have run `spack --version` and reported the version of Spack
- [x] I have searched the issues of this repo and believe this is not a duplicate

title: Support package specific compiler flag
